mapper.sql: idfid, infname, inftype, exinf, basprice, dicount, createtime, interfacecol
mapper.insert: insert into interface (idfid, infname, inftype, exinf, basprice, dicount, createtime, interfacecol) values (#{idfid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{infname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inftype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{exinf,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{basprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dicount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{interfacecol,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

idfid,

mapper.update:
update interface
infname = #{infname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inftype = #{inftype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
exinf = #{exinf,jdbcType=TINYINT},
basprice = #{basprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
dicount = #{dicount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
interfacecol = #{interfacecol,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where idfid = #{idfid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update interface set infname = #{infname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inftype = #{inftype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, exinf = #{exinf,jdbcType=TINYINT}, basprice = #{basprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, dicount = #{dicount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, interfacecol = #{interfacecol,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where idfid = #{idfid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
